name: Lem Chem
description: Lem Chem is a potent hybrid that is both sweet and sour, with distinct fuel/chemical nuances in flavor that denote its Chemdawg parentage. The buds have deep green foliage and tan/rusty pistils that also demonstrate the Chemdawg in this strain. Anticipate uplifted, mood-altering effects that settle in the limbs. The strain is neither sedative or active, but rather a balanced hybrid that reduces physical discomfort in such a way that promotes physical activity and wellbeing. Lem Chem can be very strong, so mind your dosage.

highlightedReviews.text: The lemon made my mouth water like a faucet running! This one is a good strain when one has to stay alert but enjoys doing so. Clear thinking while feeling groovy suits me fine!
Very tasty great buzz and yes itâ€™s available in Simi Valley
